website_summaries.verdict: A durable 3-piece cook set that is both lightweight and easy to clean.
pros: 3 pieces in all, including a 1.2 L pot, an 800 ml pot, and a 400 ml pan
Total weight of set is 10.5 oz
Comes with a washable cloth case
cons: Set comes with no measurement markings
Some reports that these burn easily

customer_reviews.title: the pan works great as a lid for both pots
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well,light and strong, the pan works great as a lid for both pots. If a lid was available for the pan, I would definitely buy it. I know it would mess with the nesting factor, which is excellent as is. And a can of fuel, the 230 gram size fits inside perfectly. All in all, I am very happy with my purchase. And recommend to all, add the lid for the pan and I would call it perfect. The price too, very good. Keep up the great work, and let me know if you make a lid, Sincerly,drkroft
customer_reviews.author: dra kroft

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cook set that was used on a 3 night 4 day trip for a trial run and over half the group ordered a set when they got home. I used with a fancy feast alcohol stove and straight in the fire multiple times a day. The pans held up great and clean up was easy compared to some others in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Oh Twiggy

customer_reviews.title: Ultralight
customer_reviews.text: This is a very lightweight cook set. Can easily prepare meals for 2 people. Seems to be of good quality as the more expensive sets. The only negative issue I have is there are NO measurement markings of any kind on ANY of the pots or pan. They are not advertised or pictured with any so I didn't subtract a star. It is as advertised and shipped fast.
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lightweight set for 1-2 campers!
customer_reviews.text: A touch smaller than expected, but so light! They take up little room in my pack and the light weight is awesome! Post trip report: These are really awesome! Although I was concerned about the size initially, I'm convinced they are perfect for 1-2 people to cook with. Use ranged from morning coffee, to shells-n-cheese, to making blueberry syrup for pancakes. Packing was even better when I realized that a 500g isobutane canister nests perfectly in the pots (guys add this to the description!).
customer_reviews.author: Dfib

customer_reviews.title: Loved them.
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for delivering on time, and brought us great Titanium Camping Cookware Set. I loved them. Very light and very... very...I really don't know what to say. They are very great. I'm using them at my backyard to test them before going camping. Thank you again and God bless you all.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Sky

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think I'd need or use all 3 parts every time I went out... turns out I do. .. great light weight. Functional ... just know the pan is somewhat small... very good set. Good price point . Don't know any reason to pay more for the name brand that everyone buys . I have smaller pots and needed something just a little bit bigger to cook in . These are great size.
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: light weight and very well made. I will buy more of them for gifts.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and a fair price. I now have bought The cook ware set and the mug a long with the long fork and spoon. I have them all in one bag and am very happy with them. They are very light in the backpack and all work great using them over the fire. My friend bought a high dollar set which are very heavy and does not work well as this set does LOL. Now he said he will buy him a set of these and give the other set to a scout that lives next door LOL. Keep it up finessCity. Hope to see more of your products soon.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy graham

customer_reviews.title: A nice compact cook set for camping
customer_reviews.text: A nice compact cook set for camping. The pan/pots are nicely designed to nest neatly together, and I like that the [bottom of the] pan can be used as a lid on both pots.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Totally awesome
customer_reviews.text: I was totally amazed at how well this cookware set worked, I tried it out in the backyard directly in the fire and it worked perfectly. I have tried this with several different sets and none have worked as well, cooked well.cleaned up easily, very light, I would say that for the price this is best I have ever found.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline P

customer_reviews.title: Great Gear, Fits Under Solo Titan
customer_reviews.text: I love my Solo Titan stove and the 1800 put it fits into, but you can't cook everything in a pot. That all fits nicely on top of this cookware kit, which is sitting on top of 2 Snore Peak Trek Titanium Plates. Honestly, I wish one company would offer all of the stuff "one stop", but this combo does the trick, and at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Sides

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I love the carrying pouch it comes with to keep all the pans together. I love how lightweight they are I think the sizes are perfect, people were complaining they were too small but that’s exactly what you want when backpacking. I haven’t used them so I don’t know about their durability.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Harris

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my Nee Zealand trip. When I just received the set, I like the look and the weight is so light. However, one side of the handle on two of them broke after I have used them only for a few times. Can you image you might get burned from using them for hot food because the handle is broken? I would like to request a return for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Online shopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cook set
customer_reviews.text: I have used for about 6 months both in the military and backpacking and extremely good set of pots for both quality and durability
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: This little cookware set is outstanding. Granted, it is more expensive than some similar items, but the striking light weight of titanium combined with the non-stick surface (that won't wear off!) is well-worth the price. This is much better than the similar aluminum cookware that it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Rusted
customer_reviews.text: Please pay a little more for something that won’t rust. I did everything I could to prevent this issue and still rusted
customer_reviews.author: Mike McIlrath

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Set
customer_reviews.text: Nice light weight set. Was the right size I was looking for. They will go in a back pack. So the light weight is appreciated. Plus as they nest you can squeeze a few more items in between. The seller sends you a thank you note, That tells me that they care about the product." provided in feedback in review here
customer_reviews.author: James Sotherden

customer_reviews.title: Happy trails!
customer_reviews.text: Works fine for me. Turns color with high heat and such but that’s normal and is a great product for a packer that likes to be able to cook a full meal for two that will make you feel spoiled at the end of a good trek.
customer_reviews.author: Aric

customer_reviews.title: Works great - particularly with the small cup.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. I bought two sets for our BOBs. The really nice thing is that their smaller cup will fit (contained in the bag) within the two piece set.
customer_reviews.author: jlc

customer_reviews.title: Tiny but nice
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure that these are big enough for even two people, but they are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: An excellent addition to my camping equipment. I should get many years use from them.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Very light and non toxic. Please make bigger ones!!! Cool but for 2 people max. Cant make much more in them.
customer_reviews.author: Ghost Farts

customer_reviews.title: Get little set!
customer_reviews.text: Great little titanium set. A Svea 123 fits perfectly in it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend it. It worked great
customer_reviews.text: I used the cooking set while I bike packed the Colorado trail. I would highly recommend it. It worked great , and was very light. I took the large pot and lid on my trip.
customer_reviews.author: John zell

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: Got what I ordered for the correct price. The item arrived quickly and undamaged. The price was great, really great! This item was for a backpacking trip, and I can't wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: bloozy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little backpacking cook kit. Good enough for 2 people. Very light and sturdily built.
customer_reviews.author: Farrah

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my solo backpack trip to Cumberland Island GA
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for... perfect for my solo backpack trip to Cumberland Island GA!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S. Moran

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight cookware.
customer_reviews.text: Weight I saved is great and with three pieces I can cook and boil water.
customer_reviews.author: Titanium 7

customer_reviews.title: A little expensive but good.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for though it is a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: SteelOvaries

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and weight
customer_reviews.text: Superb product. I used it last weekend on a backpack trip with boy scouts in Oregon's Strawberry Wilderness. They are lightweight and high quality. The Scouts cooked for seven people and they boiled enough water to cook for all of us.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what it says it is. Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and sturdy, I have used this several times. It cleans up easy and fits together for several options including a double boiler. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Amato

customer_reviews.title: Very compact, lightweight set good for backpacking.
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as large as I guessed it would be. was But the kit exactly as specified. Good for 1-2 persons.
customer_reviews.author: DougieG.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, small profile, packed stove inside as one unit...worked great
customer_reviews.author: MDwreckdiver

customer_reviews.title: great product.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i was expecting. For the price the fit and finish is above par, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Nnnnnnice
customer_reviews.text: Took it into the woods the day after I got it. Perfect size and feel really good. I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jammin

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrible product. Flimsy construction at best and it burns ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product. Flimsy construction at best and it burns anything you try to cook, even at low heat, not to mention there's no pour spout for boiling water. Spend the extra cash on something decent. I'd return it if I hadn't made the mistake of using it. My MSR titanium pot is far better for boiling water and I'm sure I can find a better cook pot and skillet.
customer_reviews.author: Brant Grieshaber

customer_reviews.title: Great, Bery flexible in all you cooking needs Hiking ...
customer_reviews.text: Great , Bery flexible in all you cooking needs Hiking and Backpacking
customer_reviews.author: John Acuna

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. Light weight and pan works as a lidn and also stacks to keep food warm in top pan while cooking in bottom pot.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Each piece of it got burned on first use. For the price of it they should have been much better quality. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two problems with this product. One, the first ...
customer_reviews.text: Two problems with this product. One, the first weekend I used it a black, rough spot on the inside of one of the pots the size of a quarter appeared. Now food sticks to that spot and makes a mess. I think the surface finish (?) came off in that spot. Two, the diameter of the pots is small and much of the heat escapes right up the sides instead of heating the contents.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Smith

customer_reviews.title: $50 for doll pots
customer_reviews.text: very tiny. doll size. not worth the money. I've never paid $50 for doll dishes/pots. My remote control is larger than the pots. I put a regular size post-it in the pot for visual comparison. I'm returning them immediately!!
customer_reviews.author: Soigne

customer_reviews.title: Best for cooking
customer_reviews.text: Love how light it is and how well I can cook in it.
customer_reviews.author: cecilio colon

product_meta.title: Titanium Camping Cookware Set 3-Piece (1.2L, 800ml & 400ml) / 2-Piece (1.25L & 800ml) Pot & Pan Outdoor Cooking Equipment mess kit, Strong Lightweight (Ti) Travel / Hiking / Camping in Cloth Case
feature_bullets: ✔ COMPACT TITANIUM OUTDOOR COOKWARE COOKSET: finessCity Titanium Cook Pot and Titanium Pan unlike other Camp Cookware is made of 100% Titanium. Complete with Strong folding handles our pots and pans camping cooking set are designed for camping trips & ideal to be part of any Backpacking Mess Kit. It comes with a washable Premium Cloth Case that keep them safe & away from dust. This 3 Piece Camping Gear Cooking Pot and Pan is resistant to Acid & Alkali & won't rust at all

✔ SUPER STRONG & ULTRA LIGHTWEIGHT: This Titanium Outdoor Cooking Equipment Camping Pots and Pans are Sturdy, Lightweight & easy to handle. They are perfect to be part of any Hiking Gear or Camping gear due to their High Quality. Each 3-Piece Camping Cooking Gear Total Weight is 10.5 oz. The individual weight of 1.2L Pot is 4.48 oz, 800ml Pot is 3.5 ooz & 400ml Pan is 2.54 oz. Cook set titanium Height of 1.2L/ 800ml/ 400ml is 4.8"/ 3.15"/ 1.57" & Diameter 5.12"/ 5.12"/ 5.43" Respectively.

✔ DURABLE, DISHWASHER SAFE, HEALTHY & ECO-FRIENDLY: These camp cooking gear are Corrosion & High Temperature Resistant. They are dishwasher safe and reusable, these medium size campfire cookware are Environment Friendly, odorless & flavorless. If you looking for bigger size one try our other Pot & Pan set. finessCity titanium Pot & frying Pan are much better than any Metal or Stainless Steel Outdoor Cookware.

✔ PERFECT FOR BACKPACKING, HIKING & CAMPING: Our Camping cookware titanium are long lasting, easy to use and handle. You will love the cooking experience of hot meals out on hiking or camping with our set. As it's very lightweight you can easily carry them in your backpacking trips. You can even fit/nest in quite a lot of stuff inside the camp cook pot like small stove, burner & gas canister. Its a perfect gift for friends or family who love to do camping or hiking.

✔ NO-RISK LIFETIME MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: All of our products are made out of 100% Titanium, so rest assured on the life of this titanium pot set, it's a must for camping cooking . This will last for years and on top of that if you don't like the product (which will be highly unlikely) don't worry we will refund it even after Amazon provided 30 days policy. You're protected by our LIFETIME MONEY BACK GUARANTEE, no-questions asked that is backed by our world class customer service.
